data.eml:eml: Premna grandipaniculata (Lamiaceae, Premnoideae), a remarkable new species from north Myanmar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Yun-Hong, Li, De-Rong, Zhou, Shi-Shun, Chen, Yong-Jun, Bramley, Gemma L. C., Li, Bo (2018): Premna grandipaniculata (Lamiaceae, Premnoideae), a remarkable new species from north Myanmar. PhytoKeys 94: 117-123, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.22033, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.22033
